item.title: Problem 703 Kth Largest Element in a Stream
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 703 Question Design a class to find the kth largest element in a stream.

item.title: Problem 826 Most Profit Assigning Work
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 826 Question You have n jobs and m workers.

item.title: Problem 786 K th Smallest Prime Fraction
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 786 Question You are given a sorted integer array arr containing 1 and prime numbers, where all the integers of arr are unique.

item.title: Problem 3075 Maximize Happiness of Selected Children
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 3075 Question You are given an array happiness of length n, and a positive integer k.

item.title: Problem 506 Relative Ranks
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 506 Question You are given an integer array score of size n, where score[i] is the score of the ith athlete in a competition.
